    • store

      boolean store​(Marble.Color color, int position)
      Add a resource to the specified shelf
      Parameters:
      color - color of the resource to add
      position - position of the shelf where to add the resource
      Returns:
      true if the resource could be added and false if not

    • withdraw

      boolean withdraw​(ResourceList list)
      Remove a list of resource from the shelves
      Parameters:
      list - list of resource to remove
      Returns:
      true if it was successful, false otherwise

    • move

      boolean move​(int origin, int dest)
      Move resources from a shelf to another
      Parameters:
      origin - index of the shelf from where to move the resources
      dest - index of the shelf where to place the resources
      Returns:
      true if it was possible to move the resources, false if not
